title: Horizon UI Admin Dashboard
description: an admin dashboard built based on the free community version of the horizon-ui admin dashboard user interface on figma community including many features such as charts, tables, lists, calendar, marketplace, sign-in form with validation, full-page search, and etc.

title: Comment Eraser
description: comment-eraser is a Node.js package that removes comments from JavaScript files efficiently. It offers customizable options for tailoring the comment removal process and includes an interactive mode for selective file cleanup. Overall, comment-eraser simplifies and streamlines code cleanup tasks.

title: PixLab Express
description: PixLab Express is a straightforward and intuitive online image editor created using React, Mantine-UI, and TailwindCSS. It allows you to effortlessly add filters and make changes to your images with ease. Elevate your photo editing skills with PixLab Express!

title: md2readme
description: effortlessly preview your GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) as you type it with auto-save to local-storage and support for different github themes. Enjoy hassle-free markdown formatting!

title: OCR-it
description: optical character recognition simplified! Upload your image, press "Extract," and let OCR-it work its magic - built on top of tesseract.js

title: Online Code Editor
description: an online code editor which supports HTML, Css, and Javascript with features such as built-in javascript console, expandable and resizable text fields, fullscreen mode, and also a live mode so that you can see the results as you code them

title: All Things Colors
description: a web application that provides you with different color utility tools to boost your speed and productivity - pre-defined gradients, random gradient generator, tints and shades generator, color palette generator, image palette extractor, and color mixer

title: Sorting Vis
description: sorting-viz provides an interactive and educational experience, allowing users to grasp the inner workings of various sorting algorithms with ease.

title: regex-it
description: a simple clone of the RegEx Pal website from Dan's Tools to test your JavaScript regular expressions

title: Cryptoify
description: a web application for you to check more than 300 crypto currencies including a responsive table for all screen sizes and also features like searching coins based on name or id, chart price changes table with different timeframes available, pagination and per-page options, and support for three major currencies (usd, eur, gbp)

title: type-it-fast
description: a website to test your typing skills and get certified ASAP - including instant certificate generation using jspdf and html2pdf.js, random sentences fetched from type.fit random quotes api, etc.

title: lorem ipsum generator
description: Generating Lorem Ipsums made easy! Choose your desired unit, enter the count, and simply click "Generate"! Whether you need words, paragraphs, or even bytes, we've got you covered!
